item.title: Grand Canyon South Rim hotels forced to close due to water pipe breaks
item.description: Grand Canyon South Rim faces water emergency as broken pipeline forces hotel closures. Park remains open for day visits while water repairs continue.

item.title: Small businesses lead November job losses as tariff uncertainty weighs on hiring

item.title: US sawmills warn of accelerating closures as tariffs, weak demand squeeze industry

item.title: Private sector unexpectedly lost 32,000 jobs in November, ADP says
